job_tasks.phrase: implementeren van AI-modellen in bedrijfsprocessen en- applicaties bij onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementeren van AI-modellen' directly refers to the application and integration of AI models into business processes, aligning with the core of model implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van prompt flows en integraties met systemen binnen de klantomgeving
job_tasks.justification: Developing 'prompt flows' and 'integrations with systems' clearly falls under software development, as it involves building and connecting software components.
The phrase 'in bedrijfsprocessen' indicates an understanding and application of AI within the business context of the client.

job_tasks.phrase: integraties met systemen binnen de klantomgeving
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly refers to connecting AI solutions with existing client systems, a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met het team en de klant om technische specificaties te definiëren en te documenteren
job_tasks.justification: Defining and documenting technical specifications in collaboration with clients is a direct task related to understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Testen en valideren van de geïmplementeerde modellen
job_tasks.justification: Testing and validating models is a crucial part of the modeling lifecycle, ensuring they perform as expected.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met het team en de klant
alle ruimte voor het volgen van trainingen, conferenties en workshops
technische expert met een scherp oog voor detail
gedreven en gezellige Data & AI team

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing 'prompt flows' and integrating AI models into client applications, which are core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While 'implementing AI models' is broad, the focus on prompt-based interactions and integrations with existing systems aligns strongly with building user-facing GenAI applications.
